trans-unit.source: Download the required Node.js LTS version

seg-source.mrk: Download the required Node.js LTS version

target.mrk: Laden Sie die erforderliche LTS-Version von Node.js herunter.

trans-unit.source: Stop your Workflow Accelerator Script Engine - see section <MadCap:xref href="../stop/stop.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Stopping Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Stop your Workflow Accelerator Script Engine - see section <MadCap:xref href="../stop/stop.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Stopping Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Stoppen Sie Workflow Accelerator Script Engine - siehe <MadCap:xref href="../stop/stop.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Stopping Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>.

trans-unit.source: Install the new Node.js LTS version

seg-source.mrk: Install the new Node.js LTS version

trans-unit.source: (Optional) Update your startup script / service for Workflow Accelerator Script Engine if the install directory for Node.js changed.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) Update your startup script / service for Workflow Accelerator Script Engine if the install directory for Node.js changed.

target.mrk: (Optional) Aktualisieren Sie Ihr Start-Skript / Ihren Dienst für Workflow Accelerator Script Engine insofern sich das Installationsverzeichnis für Node.js geändert hat.

trans-unit.source: Windows : If you are using NSSM to run the service, open the command line cmd with administrative privileges, execute nssm edit script-engine and update the location of Node.js in the dialog.

seg-source.mrk: Windows : If you are using NSSM to run the service, open the command line cmd with administrative privileges, execute nssm edit script-engine and update the location of Node.js in the dialog.

target.mrk: Windows: Wenn Sie NSSM verwenden, um den Dienst auszuführen, öffnen Sie die Kommandozeile cmd mit Administratorenrechten, führen Sie nssm edit script-engine aus und aktualisieren das Verzeichnis von Node.js in dem Dialog.

trans-unit.source: Start Workflow Accelerator Script Engine - see section <MadCap:xref href="../start/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Starting Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Start Workflow Accelerator Script Engine - see section <MadCap:xref href="../start/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Starting Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>.

target.mrk: Stoppen Sie Workflow Accelerator Script Engine - siehe <MadCap:xref href="../start/intro.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"> Starting Signavio Workflow Accelerator </MadCap:xref>.
